H0.text: who won women 's singles us open 2017. Garbiñe Muguruza

H1.text: who won women 's singles us open 2017. Venus Williams

H2.text: who won women 's singles us open 2017. Karolína Plíšková

H3.text: who won women 's singles us open 2017. Sloane Stephens

A4.text: Stephens closed out the tournament by defeating Keys in straight sets to win her first Grand Slam tournament title.

A5.text: She was the first American woman other than the Williams sisters to win a major title since Jennifer Capriati won the Australian Open in 2002 and the first to win the US Open since Lindsay Davenport in 1998.
